content: विरुद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Hindered, checked, opposed, obstructed. {@--2@} Blocked up, confined or shut up. {@--3@} Besieged, blockaded. {@--4@} Opposed to, inconsistent with, incongruous, inconsistent. {@--5@} Contrary, opposite, opposed in quality. {@--6@} Contradictory, proving the reverse, (as a {%hetu%} in Logic); साध्याभवव्याप्तो हेतुर्विरुद्धः <ls>Tarka K.</ls>: {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} शब्दो नित्यः कृतकत्वात् <ls>T. S.</ls> {@--7@} Hostile, adverse, inimical. {@--8@} Unfavourable, unpropitious. {@--9@} Prohibited, forbidden (as food). {@--10@} Wrong, unlawful, improper. {@--11@} Excluded. {@--12@} Uncertain, doubtful. --द्धं {@--1@} Opposition, contrariety, hostility. {@--2@} Discord, disagreement.
